00020 namespace LibBoard {
00021 
00026 struct Rect {
00027   double left;                  
00028   double top;                   
00029   double width;                 
00030   double height;                
00042   Rect( double leftX = 0.0f, double topY = 0.0f, double rectWidth = 0.0f, double rectHeight = 0.0f )
00043     :left( leftX ), top( topY ), width( rectWidth ), height( rectHeight ) { } 
00044 
00045   Point topLeft() { return Point( left, top ); }
00046   Point topRight() { return Point( left + width, top ); }
00047   Point bottomLeft() { return Point( left, top - height ); }
00048   Point bottomRight() { return Point( left + width, top - height ); }
00049 };
00050
